title: Ally
desc:
Post 2317
- If there has not been a previous 🏳️‍🌈 played, gain 1 💪 until someone does play one.
- If someone has already played / soon plays a 🏳️‍🌈 card, **Link** the 2 of you. Your **Linked** partner then draws a 1 (337) (and soon you) and you both instantly play this card out of turn order. You both gain 1 **Happy** 😃 and you discard 1 card of your choice (leading to your partner discarding one too).
